experience.title: Customer Success Associate
experience.description: ●	Increased feature adoption by 35% across xx accounts by hosting webinars and demos with Loom, while streamlining onboarding processes using Asana and Notion.●	Reduced churn by 22% by driving targeted customer engagement through regular check-ins and tracking feedback loops with Asana.●	Improved NPS from 6.2 to 8.0 and CSAT from 7.5 to 8.4 within 3 months by analyzing customer lifecycle trends and implementing feedback-driven solutions via Zendesk

experience.title: Product Strategy Consultant
experience.description: ●	Increased user interaction by 50% and reduced navigation time by 20% by designing a 115-page interactive playbook featuring clickable links, bookmarks, CTAs, and embedded forms.●	Reduced new hire training time by 50% by optimizing SOPs for 34 account managers using Salesforce CRM, Project, and Visio, incorporating detailed checklists and templates.●	Boosted user engagement by 63% by executing A/B tests and implementing UI/UX improvements, supported by a 6-month app development roadmap created in Figma.
experience.description_html: ● Increased user interaction by 50% and reduced navigation time by 20% by designing a 115-page interactive playbook featuring clickable links, bookmarks, CTAs, and embedded forms.● Reduced new hire training time by 50% by optimizing SOPs for 34 account managers using Salesforce CRM, Project, and Visio, incorporating detailed checklists and templates.● Boosted user engagement by 63% by executing A/B tests and implementing UI/UX improvements, supported by a 6-month app development roadmap created in Figma.

experience.title: Founder's Office
experience.description: ●	Drove a 25% increase in B2B sales and achieved INR 152M in annual revenue by managing international supply chain operations across North America, Europe, and Asia.●	Improved lead times by 18% by optimizing procurement and vendor management processes through MS Dynamics SCM and Google Analytics.●	Reduced logistics costs by 12% and increased on-time delivery rates by 15% by negotiating supplier contracts and agreements.●	Streamlined order fulfillment processes by re-engineering inventory systems, boosting efficiency, and contributing to a 13% increase in profitability.●	 Collaborated with 7 cross-functional teams to align procurement and distribution strategies with dynamic demand cycles and regulatory compliance.
experience.description_html: ● Drove a 25% increase in B2B sales and achieved INR 152M in annual revenue by managing international supply chain operations across North America, Europe, and Asia.● Improved lead times by 18% by optimizing procurement and vendor management processes through MS Dynamics SCM and Google Analytics.● Reduced logistics costs by 12% and increased on-time delivery rates by 15% by negotiating supplier contracts and agreements.● Streamlined order fulfillment processes by re-engineering inventory systems, boosting efficiency, and contributing to a 13% increase in profitability.● Collaborated with 7 cross-functional teams to align procurement and distribution strategies with dynamic demand cycles and regulatory compliance.

experience.title: Marketing and Customer Success Intern
experience.description: ●	Increased revenue by 13% by developing 6 Go-To-Market strategies that integrated supply chain operations with marketing initiatives.●	Led the 'Reliance on Wheels' initiative by introducing UPI payments and barcoded catalogs, improving inventory accuracy and accessibility.●	Reduced stock inaccuracies by 22% by digitizing legacy inventory systems, enabling seamless replenishment cycles and enhancing operational efficiency.●	Improved material tracking accuracy by 25% by implementing barcoded inventory systems across retail operations.●	Boosted operational coverage and efficiency by ~20% by designing end-to-end supply strategies for pop-up retail models.●	Ensured seamless product transitions by streamlining product lifecycle management, optimizing stock replenishment, and supporting successful new product launches
experience.description_html: ● Increased revenue by 13% by developing 6 Go-To-Market strategies that integrated supply chain operations with marketing initiatives.● Led the 'Reliance on Wheels' initiative by introducing UPI payments and barcoded catalogs, improving inventory accuracy and accessibility.● Reduced stock inaccuracies by 22% by digitizing legacy inventory systems, enabling seamless replenishment cycles and enhancing operational efficiency.● Improved material tracking accuracy by 25% by implementing barcoded inventory systems across retail operations.● Boosted operational coverage and efficiency by ~20% by designing end-to-end supply strategies for pop-up retail models.● Ensured seamless product transitions by streamlining product lifecycle management, optimizing stock replenishment, and supporting successful new product launches

experience.title: Data Intern (Centre of Data Engineering)
experience.description: ●	Identified internal talent and lowered costs by 14% by developing a Power BI dashboard with DAX to assess employee skill-check data, reducing reliance on external hires.●	Enhanced work efficiency by 50% by producing 6 bi-weekly reports on budgeting, production planning, and resource allocation, analyzing 220 million records using MS Excel, MS Access, and SQL.●	Expedited the employee selection process by 8x by designing a Python script to automate upskilling allowances.
experience.description_html: ● Identified internal talent and lowered costs by 14% by developing a Power BI dashboard with DAX to assess employee skill-check data, reducing reliance on external hires.● Enhanced work efficiency by 50% by producing 6 bi-weekly reports on budgeting, production planning, and resource allocation, analyzing 220 million records using MS Excel, MS Access, and SQL.● Expedited the employee selection process by 8x by designing a Python script to automate upskilling allowances. <!---->
